main.description: A contribution made toward a hypercert's impact.

role.description: Role or title of the contributor(s).

contributors.description: List of the contributors (names, pseudonyms, or DIDs). If multiple contributors are stored in the same hypercertContribution, then they would have the exact same role.

startDate.description: When this contribution started. This should be a subset of the hypercert timeframe.

endDate.description: When this contribution finished.  This should be a subset of the hypercert timeframe.

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created
